author: remm
msg: - Revert the fix, since the situation described in the bug is not valid (and I'm afraid my boss would murder me
- Cleanup getParentCL so that it returns consistent results when using privileged="true". This might have been
- After looking a bit everywhere, the CreateLoaderRule will use the same parent CL as the one which would be set
by the CopyParentCL rule, so I don't see how a problem could occur.
